channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Federal student loans are changing. Here's what to expect in 2026
item.description: The SAVE Plan is ending and repayment options will change dramatically in the new year.

item.title: Biden stopped the executions of 37 men. Trump's DOJ wants to punish them

item.title: U.S. regulators approve Wegovy pill for weight loss

item.title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
item.description: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.

item.title: Trump says US will keep or sell oil seized from Venezuela
item.description: The US president also says the US intends to keep the tankers it has intercepted off the coast of Venezuela.

item.title: Trump administration seeks to cancel thousands of asylum cases
item.description: ICE has filed more than 8,000 requests to toss out asylum claims in immigration court, asking judges to send immigrants to third-party countries.

item.title: 'A miracle': Officer shot in head during Bondi attack home from hospital
item.description: The Christmas homecoming of Jack Hibbert, who was shot in the head and shoulder, is a "miracle", his family say.

item.title: Five dead after plane carrying child burns victim crashes in Texas
item.description: The Mexican Navy plane was transporting a child to the US on behalf of a charity which cares for burns victims.

item.title: Screams for help and panic as tourists rescued from fatal Laos ferry disaster
item.description: People scrambled to safety as the ferry sank on the Mekong River, with a local woman and two children feared dead.

item.title: George Conway running for Congress from New York as a Democrat
item.description: George Conway, a conservative lawyer turned vocal critic of President Trump, has filed paperwork for a bid to represent New York City in the House.
